mapper.select: select tom.channel_gb channelGb ,tom.order_id orderId ,tom.order_date orderDate ,tom.channel_order_no channelOrderNo ,tom.cust_id custId ,tom.cust_pcode custPcode ,tm.cust_nm custNm ,tm.cust_tel custTel ,tm.cust_hp custHp ,tm.cust_zipcode custZipcode ,tm.cust_addr1 custAddr1 ,tm.cust_addr2 custAddr2 ,tma.deli_nm deliNm ,tma.deli_tel deliTel ,tma.deli_hp deliHp ,tma.deli_zipcode deliZipcode ,tma.deli_addr1 deliAddr1 ,tma.deli_addr2 deliAddr2 ,tom.pay_gb payGb ,tom.order_amt orderAmt ,tom.total_goods_price totalGoodsPrice ,tom.total_delivery_charge totalDeliveryCharge ,0.0 totalDiscountPrice ,0.0 totalUseMileage from tb_order_master tom ,tb_member tm ,tb_member_address tma where tom.order_id =#{orderId} and tom.cust_id = tm.cust_id and tom.deli_id = tma.deli_id
